sub_title: University Lecturer | Dialogue & Group Facilitator | Life Coach for mid-career humanitarian professionals, human rights & climate change activists | Team Coach for multi-cultural and diverse stakeholder teams
summary:
I provide life coaching to mid-career humanitarian aid professionals, human rights and climate change activists. Through coaching conversations, I support my clients in reconnecting with their life mission and realigning their activities with their personal values and priorities. I also help them acquire the work-life balance they desire.

I facilitate team meetings and group dialogues. I help my clients transform their activities into truly participatory, making the outcomes genuine collaborative work. "The whole is greater than the sum of its parts." 

I teach at a higher education institution in The Hague, city of peace and justice, courses including Intercultural Communication, International Law, Human Rights and Globalization. I'm passionate about highlighting the linkage between public policy-making, human rights and global challenges such as energy transition, climate change, human security and migration.
